fields.summary: iOS: VideoPlayer goes into a loading mode at the end of the video when created in a two  window app

comments.body: This is a really annoying bug. Does anyone have a workaround?

A fullscreen video player comes up in its own view controller that is presented by the top window.

Before removing the video player from the window or closing the current window it is important to dismiss this full screen movie controller.

Add activeMovie.setFullscreen(false);Â in the complete handler before removing video player and everything will work fine.
